name: Delaware St. John Volume 1: The Curse of Midnight Manor
name_original: Delaware St. John Volume 1: The Curse of Midnight Manor
description:
Delaware St. John Volume 1: The Curse of Midnight Manor is an adventure game developed by Big Time Games. It came out on 28-06-2005. It was published by Big Time Games. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Delaware St. John Volume 1: The Curse of Midnight Manor is available on PC.
